field.label: ASFA Terms
field.hint: Enter a (part of) the keyword and choose from the list/ See also at ASFA website

field.label: AGROVOC Terms
field.hint: Enter a (part of) the keyword and choose from the list/ See also at Agrovoc website

field.label: Free Keywords
field.hint: Enter here any keywords that will help searchers to find your deposit.

field.label: Geographical Terms
field.hint: Select the geographical terms your deposit covers.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter here the abstract, a short summary of the content of your deposit.

field.label: Notes
field.hint: Enter here any additional information about your deposit.

field.label: Bibliography
field.hint: You are strongly encouraged to paste the citations present in your deposit into the box below.

field.label: Description of copyright
field.hint: Enter here any indication about the restriction on access, use and reproduction of your deposit.

field.label: Funders
field.hint: Enter here the names of the corporate bodies/people who have funded your deposit.

field.label: Personal Authors
field.hint: Enter the personal name(s) responsable for the intellectual content of your deposit.

field.label: Corporate Authors
field.hint: Enter the corporate author(s) responsable for the intellectual content of your deposit.

field.label: Title *
field.hint: Enter the complete title of your deposit. Title and subtitle are divided by a double colon (:)
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Alternative Titles
field.hint: Enter here any alternative title(s) (including translations in other languages) of the title.

field.label: Journal Title *
field.hint: Enter the title of the journal your deposit belongs to.
field.required: Enter a (part of) the keyword and choose from the list

field.label: Alternative Locations (URL)
field.hint: If your deposit is available from other sites, enter those URLs here.

field.label: Publication Date *
field.hint: Enter here the date your deposit was submitted to a publisher or published.
field.required: The year is mandatory (YYYY).

field.label: Status *
field.hint: Please state here whether your deposit has been published, is currently in the process of being published (in press), or has not been published
field.required: You must enter the status.

field.label: Refereed *
field.hint: Please indicate here if your deposit has been refereed.
field.required: You must enter whether the item been refereed or not.

field.label: Language *
field.hint: Select the language(s) of your deposit.
field.required: You must enter the language of the item

field.label: Personal Authors
field.hint: Enter the personal name(s) responsable for the intellectual content of your deposit.

field.label: Corporate Authors
field.hint: Enter the corporate author(s) responsable for the intellectual content of your deposit.

field.label: Editors
field.hint: Enter the personal name of the editor(s) of the book.

field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.hint: Enter the title of the series of the book.

field.label: Conference Place
field.hint: Enter the place where the conference took place - City (State), Country.

field.label: Conference Date
field.hint: Enter the date the conference took place (starting-ending date including year) .

field.hint: Enter the personal name of the editor(s) of the book.

field.hint: Enter here the full title that is given to the proceedings publication of which your paper is a part.
field.required: You must enter a proceedings title for this conference paper.
